ygData.msgSnippet: When I said Meaga-Thief , I meant a normal thief with experience level greater than 100.  In fact whenever I say Mega in front of a chracter type s name, I

Subject: What I mean and other stuff

MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 601
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

When I said 'Meaga-Thief', I meant a normal thief with experience 
level greater than 100.  In fact whenever I say Mega in front of a 
chracter type's name, I mean the character with over 100 in experience 
level.  Once a character gets to that point, issues like strength of 
attacks become relevant.  I would like to have an alternate for the 
thief of 'Drop Bombs': drop Remote Bomb where you can control 
precisely when it explodes by pressing a key.

I actually prefer the idea of multiple entrances/exits to a castle, 
myself.  All that I have been up to will be revealed tomorrow 
(HOPEFULLY).
